wikipedia_page.main:
Paul Windsor Davies (born 1969) is a Welsh politician who served as Leader of the Welsh Conservatives and Leader of the Opposition in Wales from 2018 to 2021. He was Deputy Leader from 2011 to 2018, serving as Acting Leader in 2011 and 2018. 
Davies resigned as Welsh Conservative Leader after possible breaches of Welsh COVID-19 rules. He currently serves as Member of the Senedd (MS) for Preseli Pembrokeshire since 3 May 2007. He gained the seat from Labour and was re-elected in May 2011, and again in May 2016.
